notes.text: Provided text and ID in Edit mode for SmartFields.
LR/OP: Removed code logic related to SideEffectTypes, which is now deprecated.
LR: Enhanced support for NewAction in draft enabled apps.
Provided support for 412 warning for function import.
LR: It is now possible to store semantic date range filter field value in the iAppState. Support provided to handle semantic date range value coming via modifyStartupExtension extension point.
Provided support for semantic actions in OData V2.
ALP: App State handling supported for semantic date range implementation.
[LR][OP] - Provided a visual indication in list report tables for items that are shown on the object page in non-FCL apps.
Provided support to handle 412 warning for non-draft save scenario.
OP: Increased threshold of a single table on an object page to 20.
OP: Ensured requests for tables and charts on an object page are sent as canonical requests.
OP: Fixed margin issue for buttons in SAP Quartz theme.
ALP: Provided a fix when Smartchart is not displayed on Safari.
Changes made to avoid deadlock when app is started via mode=createWithContext.
LR: Improved ScreenReading for link inside sap.m.table.
Fixed routing issue for Canvas Page in FCL mode.
Enabled app start for dynamically created manifests.
Fix provided for apps being in busy state on navigation using Back button from a new tab.
Improved queueing of navigation requests.
OP: Fix provided when Cancel button is disabled during data loss popup.
OP: Changed setAutoFocus of FlexibleColumnLayout to False as the focus was handled by FE.
LROP: Event source set to smart table when navigation target is obtained for a smart link.
Provided lenient mode for saving object after accepting warnings in non-draft apps.
Optimized null check for i18n model in case of Delete action.
LR: Fixed provided to ignore missing PresentationVariant.
OP: Fixed label alignment issue in header.
Made changes to hide Delete button when inline delete is enabled.
LR: Set chevron navigation correctly when forwardNavigationProperty is used.
